DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: Explorer view - Lock types and symbols
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Lock types and symbols

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: No lock is shown, if the resource is not locked at all.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: An exclusive lock on single files and folders. You locked the resource

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: An inherited lock. If a folder is locked, all resources inside the folder are locked. Possibly exclusive locks on the resources are replaced by inherited locks. You locked the folder.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: For resources with siblings, the resource that is worked on gets an exclusive lock, all other siblings get a shared lock to prevent concurrent manipulation of the siblings.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The lock indicates that the resource is locked by another user.
